monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2011-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 18.2°C and salinity of 36.0. Deep water measurements extend to 2002m depth.
2011-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 15.2°C and salinity of 34.5. Deep water measurements extend to 2009m depth.
2011-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 15.1°C and salinity of 35.0. Deep water measurements extend to 2009m depth.
2011-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 9.5°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 2028m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
